lines.text: The feds couldn't hit water if they fell out of a boat!
Hawaii? On the house? Heh! No objections from me!

[to Hooker]
He's your friend... he needs protection.
And you need to tan, right?
Exactly. Was there something you wanted to say?
Do you have to be so young and so eager all the time?
I can tone the eager down, but the young I'm stuck with.
Hooker, what happened when you talked to the captain about Kalioki? Are we gonna get any more cooperation fr...

[interrupting]
Not unless Kalioke divorces the captain's sister.
Why don't you cut out the polite routine? I know a piece of Yakuza scum when I step in it.
I'm gonna take you down, right into the sewer where you belong. And I'm gonna do it in a way that's gonna hurt you the most.
